title: Goal Setting and Coping Strategies for Inquiry-Based Language Proficiency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and ability to utilize digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Learners Aim to Improve Job-Relevant Language Skills, Requiring Self-Directed Inquiry Learning to Set Achievement Goals and Acquire Context-Specific Response Strategies

learning_goals: Learners can set at least three personal achievement goals aligned with SMART criteria within a 4-week language inquiry learning process
Learners can identify obstacles during inquiry task performance in Week 8 and resolve issues by applying two context-specific coping strategies
By course completion, learners can analyze five inquiry learning logs based on peer feedback and achieve 80%+ goal attainment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
